author: gcolvin
content: How much more quickly, if at all, could we do an upgrade that _only_ provided for withdrawals?  This year?

author: timbeiko
content: Even if we want to do that, I don’t think any of the other included EIPs meaningfully changes implementation complexity?

author: timbeiko
content: I do think it’s hard to imagine shipping something on mainnet this year when we have basically 7 weeks until the Christmas holidays, and implementations haven’t started for everyone.

author: gcolvin
content: Yeah, a Happy New Year is wishful thinking.  But only EIP-3855: PUSH0 instruction is merged on all clients, so I wondered about the others.

author: timbeiko
content:
Call info for the EOF devnet breakout room next week: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/653

Friday 14:00 UTC ("old" AllCoreDevs time)
